moves.2... Nf6: I enjoy playing this as White or Black.
moves.3. d3 Bc5: As you may be able to tell, I love sacks on f7/f2!
moves.4. Bg5: This only lets me regain material on move 5. Can you see why?
moves.4... d5: This isn't the reason and I probably could have gone without this move.
moves.5. exd5: On this next move the reason Bg5 should not have been played is made apparent.
moves.5... Bxf2+: Love it! Did you see it?
moves.6. Kxf2 Ng4+ 7. Ke1 Qxg5: I am back at even now...
moves.8. Nf3: Not the best move either, I don't think.
moves.8... Qe3+: Here my opponent resigned. From our games, I gathered that he disliked trading Queens, so I figure 9. Be2 Nf2 and I win a Rook. Thank you for watching! Please R&C!
